name: Hypertus Species Compact Layers
description:
This mod [b]REQUIRES HYPERTUS![/b], if not then it will force close the game!!!
This mod overwrite most of the species (yes, even the modded ones) that have skin support to have hyperable parts. [b]WILL NOT REPLACE EXISTING NPC![/b] Generate new NPCs to see the mod in action
author: CanInBad
